code: import{useState}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import LoadingSkeleton from'../components/LoadingSkeleton';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Home(){const[palpite,setPalpite]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const gerar=async tipo=>{setLoading(true);try{const res=await api.get("/gerar_apostas?tipo=".concat(tipo));if(res.apostas&&res.apostas.length>0){setPalpite(res.apostas[0]);}else{setPalpite([]);}}catch(err){console.error(err);alert("Erro ao gerar palpites.");}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold text-blue-800 mb-4",children:"Seu Palpite"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingSkeleton,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap justify-center gap-2",children:palpite===null||palpite===void 0?void 0:palpite.map(n=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"w-10 h-10 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-full flex items-center justify-center font-bold",children:n.toString().padStart(2,'0')},n))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-center gap-2 mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>gerar('aleatorio'),className:"px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-blue-700",children:"Aleat\xF3rio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>gerar('estatistico'),className:"px-4 py-2 bg-green-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-green-700",children:"Estat\xEDstico"})]})]})});}
